name: chartjs-plugin-lineheight-annotation
description: A ChartJS annotation plugin for Line charts. It creates a line from the base of the graph to the highest datapoint. Easy to style.

scripts.build:prod: npm run build:dev && uglifyjs build/lineHeightAnnotationPlugin.js -c -m -o build/lineHeightAnnotationPlugin.min.js
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:pre: npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag=next && git push --follow-tags
